subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Merry Christmas To All!
author: Lisby
full_text:
There's also the ghosts of all those empty egg nog bottles... ;)

Ann

> - Ghost of Christmas Present
> - Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
>
> Happy Holidays to All
> - Mike
